name: Chaos
description: Chaos is a canvas, made by Snerk One. The work represents the chaos of Street Art in a simple way. I made it so that it feels like there's a hole cut out a wall in an ally in New York city and that piece is hanging in your living room. I see the work hanging in a modern home or loft where there isn't much distraction so that the artwork is the only thing that pulls your attention. On a white or grey background for example, with plenty of light.
